name: LightBear
description:
Play the new roguelike game LightBear where you take control of a fat bear trying to escape the mysterious Golden Apiary.



Unfortunately for our bear he will lose his sight if he doesn't collect numerous Light Spheres a long the way.



Watch out for 100s of different types of monsters, with unique personalities, attacks and faces!
Collect gear a long the way to make your bear stronger!
You have never played a roguelike game like this before! Purchase your copy today :)
